com.drismo.logic
Class JsonFunctions

java.lang.Object
  com.drismo.logic.JsonFunctions

public class JsonFunctions
extends java.lang.Object

Used to get the city/street name from a location. Uses 2 different webservices from www.geonames.org

See Also:
ViewTrip
